## [Computerized Adaptive Testing]

__Look at how cool this plot is!__

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.width=4}
library(cdcatR)
Q <- sim180GDINA$simQ
K <- ncol(Q)
dat <- sim180GDINA$simdat[1:100, ]
fit <- GDINA::GDINA(dat = dat, Q = Q, verbose = 0) # GDINA 
res.VARJ <- cdcat(fit = fit, dat = dat, FIXED.LENGTH = FALSE,
                 MAXJ = 20, precision.cut = .80, n.cores = 2 , print.progress = FALSE)

att.plot(cdcat.obj = res.VARJ, i = 1) # plot  for the first examinee (fixed-precision)
```
